definition: A medium that transmits audiovisual content to a wide audience, typically through electronic devices, serving as a source of news, entertainment, and educational programming. It is commonly used to refer to specific channels or networks that broadcast television programs.

examples.english: Which TV channel is currently on?

examples.german: Der Fernsehsender überträgt die Fußballspiele live.
examples.english: The TV channel broadcasts the football matches live.

examples.german: Ich schaue gerne Nachrichten auf verschiedenen Fernsehsendern.
examples.english: I like watching news on different TV channels.

examples.german: Unser Fernsehsender hat eine große Auswahl an Filmen.
examples.english: Our TV channel has a wide selection of movies.

examples.german: Der Fernsehsender hat eine hohe Einschaltquote.
examples.english: The TV channel has a high audience rating.
